PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-03422018-03-26,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActFamily Orders and Agreements Enforcement Assistance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Release of Information for Family Orders and Agreements Enforcement Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the RELEASE OF INFORMATION FOR FAMILY ORDERS AND AGREEMENTS ENFORCEMENT REGULATIONS in order to (1) improve the effectiveness of the Family Orders and Agreements Enforcement Assistance Act Part I family support debtor location scheme and maintain its relevancy with a view to supporting federal, provincial and territorial cooperation in the area of support enforcement; and (2) update the names of relevant departments as well as the names and numbers of current information banks.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0063 Publication Date: 2018-04-18
AttachmentsAttachment
